code: import*as types from'../actions/actionTypes';import initialState from'./initialState';var errorReducer=function errorReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.errors;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.RECEIVE_ERRORS:return action.error;default:return state;}};export default errorReducer;
